# b2b-tab



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                            | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether or not the tab is currently disabled. Per default it is false. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `invalid`  | `invalid`  | Whether or not the tab has an error. Per default, it is false.         | `boolean` | `false` |
| `selected` | `selected` | Whether or not the tab is currently selected. Per default it is false. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event        | Description                                                                               | Type                   |
| ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `b2b-change` | Emits whether the tab is selected whenever there is a change to the tabs selected status. | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
